name: Youmu's Trick-Or-Treater Simulator
description:
Halloween is here, and Youmu is determined to pass out as much candy as possible, but there's no time left on this frightful night! And that's not all...

She'll have to watch out for Suika! She's on a quest to gather some 'drinking snacks.' Unfortunately for all the other trick-or-treaters, the belly of an oni is not easily filled off sweets and booze. Beware! Or else she'll end up another victim of the wandering oni's candy raiding.

You have 60 seconds to pass out candy. Wait for a knock on the door, and then click and drag it open to be greeted with a group of trick-or-treaters. Click and drag from your candy bowl to give them candy to score points—as long as they aren't Suika. Then, when you're finished, close the door and wait for the next group.

This game was made for Touhou Fan Game Jam 9! It was a total blast to work in my second ever game jam (and even more fun to actually finish this one hehe). I'll definitely be rolling out a few updates, so keep an eye out!
